title: Loot
creator_credit: Silvio Narizzano, Arthur Lewis and Performing Arts
brief_description: After a bank heist, the Inspector is called upon to investigate the suspects: a gold-digging nurse, a widower, and a dead body. When the criminals are discovered, a chase ensues, and an arrest is made. Cast includes Richard Attenborough, Lee Remick, Hywel Bennett, Milo O’Shea, Dick Emery, Joe Lynch, Aubrey Woods. Based on the play by Joe Orton.
